profile.description: I have only 1 year of experience in web development. Passionate about new technologies and especially the CSS and Javascript ecosystem. My purpose is to transfer my passion for teaching web technologies to all those who want to get started in this field in an updated way, with good practices and from scratch.

experience.first-job-description: Website development in React, Angular and Vue.
experience.second-job-description: REST API development with NodeJS and Express.
experience.last-job-description: Website development in React, Angular and Vue.
